story.soThat: I can assign roles and control access
story.tasks: - Add PM team CRUD endpoints for members - Join WorkspaceMember user details for display - Implement Team tab UI with add/edit/remove and reassignment

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: - Team tab shows members with avatar, role, capacity. - Lead can add/edit/remove members with permissions. - Removal enforces reassignment when tasks are assigned.

artifacts.code: - apps/api/src/pm/team/* (controllers, services, DTOs) - apps/web/src/app/(dashboard)/dashboard/pm/[slug]/team/* (Team tab UI) - apps/web/src/hooks/use-pm-team.ts (team queries/mutations) - apps/web/src/hooks/use-workspace-members.ts (workspace member list)
